More flexibility, less complexity

Timing and flexibility mean everything when you're trying to get in on a trade. Now we have two great features that will help you zero in on your perfect trade.

The Quick 10% & Lucky 10 Digits Get a Complete Upgrade

The "Lucky 10 Digits" and the "Quick 10%" trades have now moved to the new "Digits" section. Simply purchase these as you would any other trade via the main trading interface. Trades may be purchased on the "Randoms" for a minimum duration of 5 ticks or a maximum duration of...

Binary.com Pulls the Plug on the Legacy Chart

This move comes as a result of the recent upgrade to our charting package, which we are pleased to say was very well-received by our customers. Effective from the 14 April 2014, the "Legacy Charts" will be brought down, to make room for our new and improved "Live Charts" and...

Three New Forex Markets Available

Rise/Fall trades on the USD/MXN, NZD/JPY and USD/PLN are now available with a minimum duration of 1 day. Forward-starting contracts may also be purchased on these 3 new markets with a minimum duration of 5 minutes. This upgrade puts you further in control, giving you a broader range of options...
03 September 2014 Read More...

Revamped Tick Trades from Binary.com

With the latest upgrade to our trading interface, we have redesigned the way the tick trades work. Tick trades may now be purchased on "Randoms" via the "Rise/Fall" section for a minimum duration of 5 ticks or a maximum duration of 10 ticks. Simply purchase a tick trade as you...

Why Binary?

Binary.com's patented pricing technology allows you to benefit from the same rates of return as traders in the interbank market.
